channel.title: CSS on Lawrence Lim
channel.description: Recent content in CSS on Lawrence Lim

item.title: Personal Website Workshop
item.description: Getting Started Install Code Editor: VScode Install Package Manager: Homebrew /bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh)" Install Static Site Generator Hugo brew install hugo Follow the directions on the terminal output Optional: Install Github GLI (if you want to deploy your website) brew install gh Once installed, run gh auth login and follow the directions on the terminal Create your Website Create Hugo Project hugo new site quickstart -f yml Install Theme
